author: rich
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-307 : Struts validator support for the msg and args' bundle attribute is not working
This is simply an upgrade from Struts 1.2.4->1.2.7.

author: pquerna
msg: - Only use the default key if the user was not specified.  If it user was passed, give it to gpg with '-u'.

author: roxspring
msg: Parser no longer validates the CommandLine if the help option is found
Original patch supplied by Steve Alberty
